custom-sql.sql:
SELECT YKCT_Entry.*
FROM YKCT_Entry
WHERE (UPPER(YKCT_Entry.entryName) LIKE ?)
AND (YKCT_Entry.groupId = ?)
ORDER BY modifiedDate DESC
LIMIT ?,?

SELECT YKCT_Entry.*
FROM YKCT_Entry
WHERE (YKCT_Entry.groupId = ?)
AND (UPPER(YKCT_Entry.entryName) LIKE ?)
AND (YKCT_Entry.categoryId = ?)
ORDER BY modifiedDate DESC
